verses.verse: Because of this, having this task of serving, just as we were shown forgiving kindness, we don't get discouraged.

But we denounced the hidden things of the shame, not traipsing around in slyness, nor using the message of God deceptively, but in the showing of the truth, endorsing ourselves to every conscience of people in the sight of God.
If our good news also is a thing that has been covered up, it is a thing that has been covered up among the people being ruined,

among whom, the god of this span of time blinded the thought processes of the untrusting people for the "for the illumination of the good news of the magnificence of the Anointed King (who is the image of God) not to radiate to them" part.
You see, we don't speak publicly about ourselves, but about the Anointed King Jesus, the Master (ourselves, your slaves because of Jesus),

because God, the One who told light to shine from darkness, who shined in our hearts, will shine toward an illumination of the information of the magnificence of God in the face of Jesus, the Anointed King.
We have this treasure in ceramic containers so that the superiority of the ability may be God's and not from us:
in every situation going through hard times, but not restricted; unable to find our way, but not unable to find a way out;
persecuted, but not left down in there; thrown down, but not ruined;
always carrying the dying of the Master Jesus around in the body so that the life of Jesus also might be shown in our body.
You see, we, the people living, are always given over to death because of Jesus so that the life of Jesus might also be shown in our dying physical body.
In such a way, the death certainly is active in us, but the life is active in you.
Having the same spirit of the trust in line with what has been written, (in Psalm 116:10) "I trusted, for this reason I spoke," we also trust, for this reason we also speak,
realizing that the One who got the Master Jesus up will also get us up through Jesus and will stand by together with you.
You see, all things are because of you, so that when the generosity increases through the majority of things, it might overflow the thankfulness for the magnificence of God.
For this reason, we don't get discouraged, but even if our outside person is devoured, still the inside is renewed day in and day out.
You see, the light weight of our hard times at this very instant works on and completes an even greater and greater weight of magnificence for us that spans all time,

not keeping an eye out for our things that are seen, but for the things that are not seen; for the things that are seen are for the time being, but the things that are not seen are things that span all time.
